data.title: SCMAC_author, Author at Santa Cruz Mountains Art Center
data.text:
The Art Center goes haunted this Halloween! Dare to join us at our first Halloween Haunted House, where the skeletons of artists past will gather to play tricks and give out treats. Kathryn Pierno, Mistress of Weird Illusions and our new Youth Education Director, will be revealing how art and science can be joined to [...]

This weekend Open Studios self guided art tour is focusing on the Northern part of Santa Cruz County. If you haven't figured out which artists you are checking out this weekend come by Santa Cruz Mountains Art Center in Ben Lomond and pick up your free guide which lists over 300 artists and includes detailed [...]

This Friday is the opening reception for 3 of-a-Kind, our Featured Artists Exhibit of 2018, a retrospective of artwork by Pat and Larry Worley and Linda Levy. Come enjoy the art inspired by friendship. Basketry, Ceramics, Digital Paintings, Jewelry, Fiber Art and more! Refreshments and musical entertainment provided. Exhibit: 3 of-a-Kind October 3 â€“ 27, [...]

Come explore TEXTURE! Friday, July 27, 2018 6:00 - 8:00 pm Come explore with us the many layers of texture! Both tactile and visual texture is the character of a surface. There are probably thousands of texture types; ranging from smooth or rough, to grainy and raised. Texture can even be created just by variations [...]

Felton Remembers Parade & Covered Bridge Festival Come join us at Felton's Covered Bridge Festival and celebrate Felton's 150th birthday. Check us out at booth 33 and learn what our Center is all about, what classes we have available for children and adults, our Youth Summer Art Camp program, and browse art for sale by [...]

We all have to run errands, and Tuesday, May 22nd when you go to Wild Roots in Felton a generous percentage of your purchase will be donated to support the Youth Art Scholarships at the Santa Cruz Mountains Art Center. So go on, do some shopping, run those errands and feed creativity in our youth. [...]

Ceram-A-Rama 2018 Come join the fun and see the clay get put into action! Saturday, May 19, 2018 12:00 - 4:00 pm Free fun for the whole family! Demos by master artists Yumiko Aso and Carlos Dye Crazy Contests Kids' Corner Food & Music Have you ever wondered how people make pottery? What a real [...]

Art makes the perfect gift this Mother's Day! Join us on Saturday, May 12 from 11:00 am - 5:00 pm for our Annual Mother's Day Sale. We have wonderful gifts that celebrate motherhood, everything from cards and journals to jewelry, bags, and shawls, plus garden art, sculpture, mugs, bowls, and many more one-of-a-kind pieces of [...]

Lori Wilson Holds a Bachelors' Degree in Visual and Public Art from Cal State University Monterey Bay. She has been teaching art to elementary students since 2003. She is a resident art teacher for Scotts Valley Unified School District as well as the Santa Cruz City School District, and the Soquel Union School District. Her [...]

Amanda West is a singer-songwriter, recording artist, music teacher and mother. A native of California, Amanda grew up singing around campfires and began her career as a performing singer-songwriter when she was a teen. Through her studies and travels she has come to understand music to be a part of our universal human birthright, playing [...]
